text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Buckle up! Time for a one-on-one!

Hearing a spirited voice echoing from<n>the direction of the
pool, I decide to go<n>take a look.

There I find two clusters of students<n>buzzing excitedly
around Hishi<n>Amazon and Fuji Kiseki.

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Hello, Trainer! Did you come to<n>watch this month's
"Battle of the<n>Dorms: Pool Edition" too?
choice_data_list: There are dorm battles? And editions?

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
That's right! This one's a competition<n>to decide which
dorm's in charge of<n>cleaning the pool!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha. It might be nice to clean it<n>together once in a while
as well.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Nope, the loser's gotta do it!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I mean, don't get me wrong. It's notthat I don't like cleaning, even if itis hard work.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But as the proud leader of the Miho<n>Dorm, I'll be damned if
I lose to my<n>Ritto counterpart!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Woo, that's our Hishiama! You've<n>got this one in the bag!
Hope you're<n>ready, Ritto Dorm!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe. I should have known you'd<n>see it that way,
Hishiama.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Not that I don't share your sentiment.<n>I couldn't bear to
dampen the spirits<n>of my darling ponies any further.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: As head of Ritto Dorm, I shall rise up<n>to this challenge!

text_block_list.name: Ritto Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Squee! You're the absolutecoolest, Fuji! Get out there andshow those Miho Dorm scrubswho's boss!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: All right! Let's see how we'll be<n>battling it out!

With that, a student comes running<n>over holding five strips
of paper, each<n>bearing a potential challenge.

Tasked with deciding the theme for<n>their match, Amazon
selects one of<n>the slips...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What?! A-a pop quiz showdown?

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Oh no! Of all the things... That's the<n>type of contest she
struggles with the<n>most!

text_block_list.name: Ritto Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Talk about a lucky break! Fuji's got<n>everything—including
brains! Miho<n>Dorm doesn't stand a chance. Ritto's<n>
practically won already!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Argh...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: No... You never know until you try!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'm not gonna throw in the towel<n>before we even start! It's
you and<n>me, Fuji—one-on-one!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, I had a feeling you'd say that!<n>Then without further
ado, let's get this<n>show on the road!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hello, hello! You'll need a neutral<n>party to ask the questions,
and since I<n>don't belong to Miho or Ritto, I'll do<n>the
honors!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Thank you for agreeing to help us,<n>Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, think nothing of it. This is fun for<n>me too! ♪ Now then,
let's kick things<n>off with our first question!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
When too many people are involved<n>in managing or making
a decision, it<n>can end up complicating matters. In<n>other
words, "Too many cooks"...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ooh, me! Me, me, me, me, me!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: My, that was fast! Hishiama, your<n>answer, if you please!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Heh. So basically, it's bad news<n>when there's no clear
leader to rally<n>behind, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
In that case... everyone can just<n>follow me! I'll take any
and all under<n>my wing! That's my answer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! That sounds just like you.<n>But as much as I adore
your<n>response, I'm sorry to say it's<n>incorrect.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. I believe the answer is "Too<n>many cooks spoil the
broth." Right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Correct! That's one point for Fuji! ♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What?! Dammit... Bring on the next<n>one!

Although Amazon is consistently first<n>to buzz in, she
nevertheless answers<n>each question incorrectly, causing
the<n>point gap to gradually widen.
However...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Here comes the final question! "Many<n>drops make a
shower"—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Awww yeeeah! Me, me, meee!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: The answer is "Every little bit helps"!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Whoa!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh my! Ding, ding, ding! That's<n>one-hundred percent correct,<n>
Hishiama!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
By the way, the full question was,<n>"'Many drops make a
shower.' What<n>is the meaning of this proverb?"

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Bwahaha, how 'bout them apples?<n>I'm not too shabby at
English lit! Plus,<n>I just came across that phrase the<n>other
day—

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Sh-shut it! I still got the answer right!

In the end, Amazon only answers that<n>one question
correctly, and the match<n>ends in a landslide victory for Fuji<n>
and the Ritto Dorm.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Argh, I can't believe I lost! Sorry,<n>guys! I was totally useless
out there...

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: No! That's not true at all!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
You refused to give up even when<n>things weren't going
your way, and<n>you kept fighting right up to the very<n>last
moment. It seriously lit a fire in my<n>heart!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Really? Hehe! You sure know how to<n>make a gal blush.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Well, a loss is a loss. Let's get that<n>pool spick and span! I'll
spearhead<n>the scrubbing, so try to keep up!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
And you can bet I won't lose to Fuji<n>next time around! I'll
have my<n>revenge—just you wait and see!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Clap, clap, clap...
choice_data_list: (That's what I call a great personality!)

text_block_list.text:
I leave with a striking impression of<n>Hishi Amazon as
someone who<n>refuses to run away, no matter the<n>
situation.
